channel.title: Neonatal Neuroimaging Unit - Blog
channel.description: Science updates on neonatal neuroscience, fNIRS and EEG from CIMeC.

item.title: RAI Trentino
item.description: The Neonatal Neuroimaging Unit activities have been recently (June 2016) covered by RAI Trentino, the local branch of the italian national TV. The video is available here.

item.title: Welcome
item.description: Welcome! I created this website to host the scientific research conducted at the Neonatal Neuroimaging Unit.
